fields.name: Nike Dri-FIT Cotton Tee
fields.description: Get a tee that fits your active lifestyle, like this moisture-wicking, cotton-rich crewneck with crosshatch swoosh design.  Dri-FIT Cotton moisture management technology helps keep you cool and dry crewneck cotton/polyester washable imported

fields.name: Champion Jersey T-Shirt
fields.description: Compete, exercise or simply relax in comfort with a classic tee from Champion, the brand that's been making quality athletic apparel since 1919.  regular fit crewneck taped neck left chest logo embroidery cotton except oxford and granite heather are cotton/polyester washable imported
